description: A warm salad that has crunch and packed with smoky flavours.
keywords: Green salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Balsamic Roast Artichoke with Fire Roasted Capsicum & Rocket Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g artichokes, store bought jar and drained
1 medium red capsicum, de-seeded and quartered
1 medium yellow capsicum, de-seeded and quartered

recipeInstructions.text: Place the cut peppers and artichokes onto a baking tray, drizzle with 2 tbs of olive oil, balsamic and spread some salt and pepper evenly.
Bake in the oven for 15 minutes.
Mix your rocket in a salad bowl with the chopped shallots and sprinkle 1 tbs of olive oil.
Remove the veg from the oven and serve with the dressed rocket leaves.
